How to submit?

1. x Upload your code to a public repository (e.g. GitHub)
1. Upload your data (if any) to a public repository (e.g. Zenodo)
1. Write the corresponding paper using the proposed LaTeX template or your own template
1. Fill metadata associated with your submission using the provided template
1. Submit your paper
1. Answer reviewers comments and modify your code and paper accordingly
1. Once accepted, you will need to:  i) complete the metadata in collaboration with the editor
ii) upload your code to Zenodo in order to get a DOI.

This submission to ReScience-C was done in R
https://github.com/ReScience-Archives/Petchey-Plebani-Pennekamp-2016
